title: Deliveroo | SSE | Hyderabad | Offer Evaluation
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: ~7

##### Current
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L61
Location: Hyderabad
Base: 27.5L
Bonus: 20%
Stock: 46 units RSU
Total comp (27.5 + 2.75 + ~20): ~INR 50L
Benefits: standard MS benefits
Other details: Have an internal offer from a different team but the compensation and the level remains as is.

##### Offer
Company: Deliveroo
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Hyderabad
Base: 63L
Bonus: 10%
Total comp (63 + 6): ~INR 69L
Other details: The recruiter said that this is the best that they can offer. Have hear that the WLB is good too.

Please suggest if I should continue with MS considering that I have 46 unit of RSU for the next one year but at the same time the growth in MS is super slow.
